translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思えば俺らも遠くまで来たよなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when I think about it, we've come a long way, haven't we?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「翔竜山に、砂漠に、魔物の支配する都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Mount Shoryu, the desert, the city ruled by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの死国に、異界に、魔物界に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the dead country of JAPAN, the other world, the monster realm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯に闘神大会に出場して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the icy wastelands and participating in the Fighting God tournament..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ、しまいにゃ空飛ぶお城や、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, and in the end, even a flying castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の王国と来たもんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Kingdom of Clouds too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジで色んなとこ行ったよなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, we've been all over the place..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞と初めて会ったときは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I first met <Eiru>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかこうなるなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined it would turn out like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、魔王の子ってこと自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I mean, I didn't even really believe you were the Demon King's child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちーっとも信じてなかったのにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not even a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえばそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that you mention it, that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君は魔王の子だと告げると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Nagata-kun was told he was the Demon King's child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は笑われまでしたのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was even laughed at at first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっちゃけ一人旅ってのも寂しいからよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To be honest, solo traveling is lonely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に行ってくれる奴がいたらなーって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted someone to go with me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけだったんだぜ？　俺」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was all there was to it, you know? Me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが気づけば、魔王と決戦、かあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And before I knew it, a showdown with the Demon King, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行きたくねー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't wanna go..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、魔王が怖いってのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's not just that I'm afraid of the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんあるけどよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's obviously true, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だってよぉ、明日で全部終わったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see, if everything ends tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで冒険って終わりなんだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then the adventure ends there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなバラバラに家に帰っちまうんだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone will just go back home separately, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うはっ……さびしーーー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... that's so lonely..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この、いつも陽気で明るくお調子者のあなたの友は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This friend of yours, who is always cheerful, bright, and playful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王と戦うことよりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hated the idea of the adventure ending more than fighting the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険の終わりを嫌がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hated the end of the adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホみてぇに楽しかったのになぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was stupidly fun, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分で言ってて実感したけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying it myself, I actually realized it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう冒険終わるんだよなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the adventure really is ending now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、＜エール＞」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I, <Eiru>"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意に長田君が顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Nagata-kun looks up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、あー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日は決戦じゃん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow's the final battle, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、今の内に言っときたいんだけどさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I want to say this now before then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を冒険に連れて行ってくれてサンキューな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thank you for taking me along on this adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、だってさ、だってさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I mean, just think about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくよく考えなくたってそうじゃね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even without thinking deeply, isn't that true?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普通じゃ出来ねーような冒険の連続でよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This has been an adventure full of things you normally can't do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子達はどいつもこいつも面白い奴ばっかで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all the Demon King's children are interesting guys,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんで明日は世界の命運を賭けた決戦だぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tomorrow's the big battle for the fate of the world, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのつまらないわけねーじゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way this can be boring!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの日、お前について行かなきゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I hadn't gone with you that day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう経験、一つも出来なかったんだよなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't have had a single one of these experiences,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って思ったらさ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what I thought..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、礼の一つでも言っておかなきゃってよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, well, I figured I should at least say thanks..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、少し照れているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, he's a little embarrassed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君は頬をかすかに赤く染めてポリポリと掻いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun faintly blushes and scratches his cheek.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、にしても、ここまで色々とあったよなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, even so, we've been through a lot until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジやべーことも死ぬかと思ったことも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously dangerous things and times I thought I was going to die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度や二度じゃなかったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were more than just one or two..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、今にしてみれば全部笑い話だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, looking back now, it's all funny stories."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日はその総決算だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tomorrow's the grand finale!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バシーッと俺らの実力を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll show off our true strength with a bang!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

embarrassed."},{"lineNumber":203795,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君は頬をかすかに赤く染めてポリポリと掻いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun faintly blushes and scratches his cheek."},{"lineNumber":203796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへ、にしても、ここまで色々とあったよなぁ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, even so, we've been through a lot until two...\""},{"lineNumber":203799,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、今にしてみれば全部笑い話だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, looking back now, it's all funny stories.\""},{"lineNumber":203800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「明日はその総決算だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tomorrow's the grand finale!"},{"lineNumber":203801,"originalJapaneseLine":"　バシーッと俺らの実力を","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll show off our true strength with a bang!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しっかし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Still..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 思えば俺らも遠くまで来たよなぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when I think about it, we've come a long way, haven't we?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「翔竜山に、砂漠に、魔物の支配する都市、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Mount Shoryu, the desert, the city ruled by monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: JAPANの死国に、異界に、魔物界に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the dead country of JAPAN, the other world, the monster realm,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 氷雪地帯に闘神大会に出場して……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to the icy wastelands and participating in the Fighting God tournament..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははっ、しまいにゃ空飛ぶお城や、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haha, and in the end, even a flying castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雲の王国と来たもんだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the Kingdom of Clouds too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジで色んなとこ行ったよなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, we've been all over the place..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞と初めて会ったときは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When I first met <Eiru>,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさかこうなるなんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined it would turn out like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ていうか、魔王の子ってこと自体、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I mean, I didn't even really believe you were the Demon King's child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちーっとも信じてなかったのにな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: not even a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえばそうだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that you mention it, that's true.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君は魔王の子だと告げると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Nagata-kun was told he was the Demon King's child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初は笑われまでしたのだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was even laughed at at first.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぶっちゃけ一人旅ってのも寂しいからよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To be honest, solo traveling is lonely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一緒に行ってくれる奴がいたらなーって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I just wanted someone to go with me,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけだったんだぜ？　俺」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was all there was to it, you know? Me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それが気づけば、魔王と決戦、かあ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And before I knew it, a showdown with the Demon King, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行きたくねー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't wanna go..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、魔王が怖いってのも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, it's not just that I'm afraid of the Demon King,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もちろんあるけどよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's obviously true, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だってよぉ、明日で全部終わったら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you see, if everything ends tomorrow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで冒険って終わりなんだろ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then the adventure ends there, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなバラバラに家に帰っちまうんだろ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone will just go back home separately, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うはっ……さびしーーー……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... that's so lonely..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この、いつも陽気で明るくお調子者のあなたの友は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This friend of yours, who is always cheerful, bright, and playful,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王と戦うことよりも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: hated the idea of the adventure ending more than fighting the Demon King.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冒険の終わりを嫌がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He hated the end of the adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アホみてぇに楽しかったのになぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was stupidly fun, wasn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そっかぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分で言ってて実感したけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying it myself, I actually realized it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう冒険終わるんだよなぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the adventure really is ending now..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、＜エール＞」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I, <Eiru>"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不意に長田君が顔を上げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Nagata-kun looks up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、あー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, ah..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日は決戦じゃん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow's the final battle, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、今の内に言っときたいんだけどさ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, I want to say this now before then,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺を冒険に連れて行ってくれてサンキューな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: thank you for taking me along on this adventure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、だってさ、だってさ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I mean, just think about it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくよく考えなくたってそうじゃね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even without thinking deeply, isn't that true?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「普通じゃ出来ねーような冒険の連続でよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This has been an adventure full of things you normally can't do,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子達はどいつもこいつも面白い奴ばっかで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and all the Demon King's children are interesting guys,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんで明日は世界の命運を賭けた決戦だぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and tomorrow's the big battle for the fate of the world, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こんなのつまらないわけねーじゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way this can be boring!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの日、お前について行かなきゃ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I hadn't gone with you that day,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう経験、一つも出来なかったんだよなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wouldn't have had a single one of these experiences,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: って思ったらさ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what I thought..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、礼の一つでも言っておかなきゃってよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, well, I figured I should at least say thanks..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、少し照れているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, he's a little embarrassed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君は頬をかすかに赤く染めてポリポリと掻いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Nagata-kun faintly blushes and scratches his cheek.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、にしても、ここまで色々とあったよなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, even so, we've been through a lot until now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジやべーことも死ぬかと思ったことも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seriously dangerous things and times I thought I was going to die,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度や二度じゃなかったけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were more than just one or two..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、今にしてみれば全部笑い話だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, looking back now, it's all funny stories."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「明日はその総決算だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tomorrow's the grand finale!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バシーッと俺らの実力を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll show off our true strength with a bang!"
